We love your supply chain.
Do you?

From matching BFF partner to day-to-day advice, ConsultUs got you covered.

How much and how often is up to you?

Partner Matching

We “know guys” in FMCG, food and organic food, but we can find what you need in every other industry in Serbia and the region. Whatever you need, we’ll find the right person, and connect you two directly.

There are countless firms out there that act either as middlemen or resellers. In most cases, they even keep partners’ names hidden from one another, to keep taking commissions! Not us. Our mission is to promote the virgin opportunities in Serbia, so we think long-term. Our logic is that satisfied partners will create a better ecosystem, which will leads to more demand for our diversified services.

We know great businesses that could use some capital to achieve wonders, but can’t get it in Serbia or around. You might be their game-changer, and reap the fruits.

Investment Opportunities

For example, we used to know a factory that made bottled water that was by all parameters better than the premium brand in the region. But they couldn’t get the capital to invest in production technology and marketing to large distributors. If you are interested in an industry or simply have spare capital, we might have just the opportunity you need, and no one else knew about before.

Sales Support & Project Management

You might be in the process of reorganizing your supply chain, or involved in some big investment. You know we always have a few aces up our sleeve, and decide to hear our thoughts on the matter.

Remember, we know people and markets.

We can suggest you a way to incorporate partners from this part of the world (i.e. cheap and efficient subcontractors), or give advice about how to best implement new solutions – it’s what we have been doing for years. Also, when you are already in the game with a new partner, we can make your collaboration easier. By, for example, suggesting the best markets and ways to boost sales. Remember, we know people and markets.

Founded by two industry veterans.

ConsultUs was founded by two industry veterans. We know people, business environments, and we mean business. We are here to give advice in every stage of your expansion, and help you and your newfound partners thrive together.

Consulting and Cross-Border

Let us support your test organization. Benefit from our knowledge.

What we fight for is the promotion of healthy and long-term trade partnerships. Therefore, in addition to matching partners, we can advise them in every aspect of business, including:

  • Company formation
  • Customs
  • General legal advice
  • Marketing and sales
  • Organization

Additionally, we pride ourselves with a deep understanding of cross-border management we know how different markets and cultures think and function, and we can get transfer this knowledge to our clients through training and day-to-day counseling.
